body:
Bumps [github.com/opentracing/opentracing-go](https://github.com/opentracing/opentracing-go) from 1.0.2 to 1.1.0.
Release notes *Sourced from [github.com/opentracing/opentracing-go's releases](https://github.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/releases).* > ## Release 1.1.0 > Notable changes: > - The library is now released under Apache 2.0 license > - Use Set() instead of Add() in HTTPHeadersCarrier is functionally a breaking change (fixes issue [#159](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/159)) > - 'golang.org/x/net/context' is replaced with 'context' from the standard library > > List of all changes: > > - Export StartSpanFromContextWithTracer ([#214](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/214)) > - Add IsGlobalTracerRegistered() to indicate if a tracer has been registered ([#201](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/201)) > - Use Set() instead of Add() in HTTPHeadersCarrier ([#191](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/191)) > - Update license to Apache 2.0 ([#181](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/181)) > - Replace 'golang.org/x/net/context' with 'context' ([#176](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/176)) > - Port of Python opentracing/harness/api_check.py to Go ([#146](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/146)) > - Fix race condition in MockSpan.Context() ([#170](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/170)) > - Add PeerHostIPv4.SetString() ([#155](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/155)) > - Add a Noop log field type to log to allow for optional fields ([#150](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/150))
Changelog *Sourced from [github.com/opentracing/opentracing-go's changelog](https://github.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md).* > 1.1.0 (2019-03-23) > ------------------- > > Notable changes: > - The library is now released under Apache 2.0 license > - Use Set() instead of Add() in HTTPHeadersCarrier is functionally a breaking change (fixes issue [#159](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/159)) > - 'golang.org/x/net/context' is replaced with 'context' from the standard library > > List of all changes: > > - Export StartSpanFromContextWithTracer ([#214](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/214)) > - Add IsGlobalTracerRegistered() to indicate if a tracer has been registered ([#201](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/201)) > - Use Set() instead of Add() in HTTPHeadersCarrier ([#191](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/191)) > - Update license to Apache 2.0 ([#181](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/181)) > - Replace 'golang.org/x/net/context' with 'context' ([#176](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/176)) > - Port of Python opentracing/harness/api_check.py to Go ([#146](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/146)) > - Fix race condition in MockSpan.Context() ([#170](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/170)) > - Add PeerHostIPv4.SetString() ([#155](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/155)) > - Add a Noop log field type to log to allow for optional fields ([#150](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/150))
Commits - [`659c906`](https://github.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/commit/659c90643e714681897ec2521c60567dd21da733) Update CHANGELOG - [`5c2c4b7`](https://github.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/commit/5c2c4b7948836f2a46ec83e3bd55ae11186d9543) Update CHANGELOG for 1.1.0 - [`ba77b66`](https://github.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/commit/ba77b66da674e65f03c9bdc82da12baa26690f16) Export StartSpanFromContextWithTracer ([#214](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/214)) - [`ccc7f4a`](https://github.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/commit/ccc7f4a60709582b1472bc7a4d35fcdd79a6cc63) Bump Go versions to 1.11/12 ([#213](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/213)) - [`25a84ff`](https://github.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/commit/25a84ff92183e2f8ac018ba1db54f8a07b3c0e04) Change http to https for security links ([#207](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/207)) - [`de56207`](https://github.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/commit/de56207ee69b19033e89021115aa06d16bb8b0be) Fix redundant import alias ([#206](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/206)) - [`8b5a441`](https://github.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/commit/8b5a441dc60e8d9bb9bf9d22060b6d94fa599983) Add support to GlobalTracer to indicate if a tracer has been registered ([#201](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/201)) - [`f6bb0d0`](https://github.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/commit/f6bb0d0069d8d2525187fefef15b38c212ae8d9a) Fix lint and coverage ([#202](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/issues/202)) - [`6b6f234`](https://github.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/commit/6b6f234010e1ed7b15741dd4e9b06332b2fba00b) Fix golint path - [`be550b0`](https://github.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/commit/be550b025b433cdfa2f11efb962afa2ea3c4d967) Fix link to specification - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/opentracing/opentracing-go/compare/v1.0.2...v1.1.0)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=github.com/opentracing/opentracing-go&package-manager=go_modules&previous-version=1.0.2&new-version=1.1.0)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=github.com/opentracing/opentracing-go&package-manager=go_modules&previous-version=1.0.2&new-version=1.1.0) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) --- **Note:** This repo was added to Dependabot recently, so you'll receive a maximum of 5 PRs for your first few update runs. Once an update run creates fewer than 5 PRs we'll remove that limit. You can always request more updates by clicking `Bump now` in your [Dependabot dashboard](https://app.dependabot.com).
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot ignore this [patch|minor|major] version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor/major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot use these labels` will set the current labels as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these reviewers` will set the current reviewers as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these assignees` will set the current assignees as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use this milestone` will set the current milestone as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in your Dependabot [dashboard](https://app.dependabot.com): - Update frequency (including time of day and day of week) - Pull request limits (per update run and/or open at any time) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired) Finally, you can contact us by mentioning @dependabot.
title: build(deps): bump github.com/opentracing/opentracing-go from 1.0.2 to 1.1.0
